display_long_description:
"Cleric and Goblins" is a thrilling VR action game featuring procedurally generated dungeons, a physics-based combat system, and intense loot collection. Your mission? To rescue the ever-unfortunate Cleric from a goblin-infested dungeon! But beware of the goblins' cunning traps at every turn. Battle your way through hordes of goblins, rescue the Cleric, and claim the ultimate loot in this hack-and-slash adventure!

# Unique Physics-Based Combat System
Weapons have weight and friction, and goblins are equally affected by physics. Swinging a sword lightly won’t suffice. **Strike slowly, Precise force, and Deeply Stab the vital points!**
[media]

# Rescue the Cleric!
**Your mission is to rescue the kidnapped Cleric!** Navigate through goblin traps, save her, and safely escort her out of the dungeon! Remember, she is subject to physics too!
[media]

# Infinite Dungeons! Aim for the Ultimate Loot!
**The dungeon changes every time you dive!** Break through randomly generated dungeons and collect ultimate loots! Enjoy the adventure as many times as you want!
[media]
